complaints.title: Dustbin overflowing near market
complaints.description: The waste collection bin near the main market is overflowing for the past 2 days. Waste is scattered around creating hygiene issues.

complaints.title: Missing dustbin near school
complaints.description: There should be a waste collection bin near the school entrance. Students are throwing waste on the street.

complaints.title: Park Road bin broken
complaints.description: The dustbin lid is broken and won't close properly. Animals are getting into it.

complaints.title: Unauthorized dumping at site
complaints.description: Large construction waste being dumped illegally near the hospital road. Need immediate investigation.
